Calix Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ Australia nke isi teknụzụ ya bụ "ọkụ" e wuru na Bacchus Marsh nke na-emepụta "mmanụ aṅụ mineral"
Nkà na ụzụ Calix gụnyere ọrụ na ijide CO2 iji dozie nsogbu nkwado zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere ọgwụgwọ mmiri, aquaculture, nchekwa ike dị elu na mmepụta simenti / lime.
Ngwaahịa Calix gụnyere ACTI-Mag, BOOSTER-Mag na AQUA-Cal+.
Mmalite nke Calix malitere na 2005, site na ọrụ na ọkụ ọkụ
N'afọ 2007, e wuru ụlọ ọrụ calciner mbụ ha iji nwalee ihe ga-ekwe omume na ụlọ ọrụ calcener CFC 850 guzosiri ike na Bacchus Marsh n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2012, Calix nwetara ụlọ ndị na-egwupụta ihe na Myrtle Springs, South Australia
N'etiti afọ 2013 na 2017 Calix guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na South East Asia ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye na ego maka teknụzụ dịgasị iche iche na-adịgide adịgide gụnyere nyocha Advanced Battery, na ngwa ọrụ ugbo

Calix depụtara n'ihu ọha na Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) na 2018 na nhazi ya na LEILAC lime & ciment enweghị mmetụta dị ala ) na Europe, malitere iwu ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nnwale na Lixhe, Belgium
N'afọ 2019, Calix nwetara ụlọ ọrụ US Inland Emperior Resources
Calix bụ onye mmekọ dị mkpa na, ma na-enye isi teknụzụ maka, Ihe oru ngo LEILAC (Mgbapụta dị ala lime enweghị uche & Cement), dị ka akụkụ nke Horizon 2020, mmemme nke European Commission guzobere.
Calix Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze Australia edepụtara na Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) na 2018
Tupu ndepụta ya, ndị na-etinye ego gụnyere Och-Ziff Capital Management Group na Washington H Soul Pattinson kwadoro Calix
Kemgbe a tọrọ ntọala ya na 2005, Calix Limited etinyela ihe karịrị $ 40 nde iji zụọ ahịa teknụzụ na usoro ya.
